caption.title: Projected changes (%) in E 0 by 2050 across the different E 0 formulations.
caption.p: Percent change in mean MJJAS E 0 from Penman-Monteith (top row), Hargreaves-Samani (center), and Priestley-Taylor (bottom) formulations for GFDL-ESM2M (left) and CanESM2 (right) by 2050 (2036–2065) relative to the historical (1976–2005) period. Grid cells where the change is not statistically significant (i.e., p > 0.05) are masked out in white.
